data.title: New York Post
data.meta_description: Get the latest cary grant news, articles, videos and photos on the New York Post.
data.text:

'I never knew what was going to set him off': Dyan Cannon says ex Cary Grant constantly criticized her

Actress Dyan Cannon told The Post that ex-husband Cary Grant constantly criticized her: "When he wasn't at work he trailed me around the house, listing my shortcomings."
